pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry Protobuf Encoding===============================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-exporter-otlp-proto-common.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-exporter-otlp-proto-common/This library is provided as a convenience to encode to Protobuf. Currently used by:* opentelemetry-exporter-otlp-proto-grpc* opentelemetry-exporter-otlp-proto-httpInstallation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-exporter-otlp-proto-commonReferences----------* `OpenTelemetry <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `OpenTelemetry Protocol Specification <https://github.com/open-telemetry/oteps/blob/main/text/0035-opentelemetry-protocol.md>`_
